When a fishing trawler is attacked by an unseen creature, and other evidence of a massive reptilian creature is unearthed, he realises that the creature is following a destructive path to New York.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guys insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one anothers loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, shes left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dual
programme.desc: Upon receiving a terminal diagnosis, Sarah opts for a cloning procedure to ease her loss on her friends and family. When she makes a miraculous recovery, her attempts to decommission her clone fail, leading to a court-mandated duel to the death.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Haunting of the Queen Mary
programme.desc: Mysterious and violent incidents occur during a familys 1938 cruise aboard the RMS Queen Mary. These events strangely connect to another familys fate on the same ocean liner in the present.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: I Dont Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous holiday.

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: Reuniting after the tragic death of their friend, four college friends set out to hike through the Scandinavian wilderness. But a wrong turn leads them into the mysterious forests of Norse legend, where an ancient evil stalks them at every turn.

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: Vacation turns disaster when Kyle and her friends escape a plane crash in the desolate Louisiana everglades, only to discover theres something more dangerous lurking in the shallows.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: A young photographer uncovers a dark secret when he meets his girlfriends seemingly friendly parents for the first time at their posh estate.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: A young photographer uncovers a dark secret when he meets his girlfriends seemingly friendly parents for the first time at their posh estate.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: Mobster moll Gloria, fresh out of prison, finds shes the guardian of Nicky, just six years of age but the only one with the information that will finger her ex Kevin who put her inside, and see him get his just desserts (and her some of his dough).

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: Sew Torn
programme.desc: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a briefcase from a drug deal gone bad. In an escalating game of cat and mouse, her different choices lead to drastically different outcomes along the way.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.desc: The team scramble to help a trio of troubled baby wallabies and a koala having seizures. Plus, a kookaburra has feather-implant surgery and a spoonbill gets corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Julz and park scout Simon track the Kakuli pack who they filmed previously, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. The Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Encountering an elephant as Julz and Henry track the Kakumbi pups who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. ZCPs lion specialist Thandie Mweetwa counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: The Kakumbi see a leopard whos been stalking them, Julz goes fishing with Simon, explores mealtime pack hierarchy and witnesses a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Heading back to the den with the Kakumbi who are mourning the loss of two pups. A look at a hyena den and lion pride trying to take down a buffalo and catching up with the Manzi who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change.

programme.desc: Michael and Dwight spy on a rival paper company, while the rest of the office debates whether or not Hilary Swank is hot.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: When Dwights unannounced fire-safety drill gives Stanley a heart attack, Michael decides the office needs help with stress relief. While watching a bootleg movie, Andy believes Jim and Pam are film gurus from hearing them discuss her parents faltering marriage.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart and Lisa try to outdo each other with scary Halloween stories.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Sinister

programme.title: Brassic

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: The dog unit deal with a man who has barricaded himself in his house with a Rottweiler inside. Plus a woman thought to have overdosed disappears.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: The Road Crime Unit and the Tactical Aid Group join forces on a drugs raid, and must use a fire extinguisher to calm down an aggressive dog. Meanwhile, Tony gets hands on with a lad he suspects has swallowed something, and Giles experiences deja vu when he pulls over the same motorist twice in one week. Finally, shocking Stateside footage shows a female drink-driver offering an officer more than just a breath test, and an inebriated individual reversing onto a squad car.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Hondo and his old DEA friend join forces to locate the secretive leader of a drug-smuggling ring. Jessica puts her new law enforcement initiatives into action.

programme.desc: An octogenarian couple return to room 104 to relive their first night together.

programme.desc: Alleged child abuse, an ankle monitor, and a restraining order come into play when a father and son sue a former roommate to get their property back. A young woman accused of vandalising a rental property points the finger at her husband.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Man Suspects Hes a Father!; Dog Custody Battle!
programme.desc: After seeing a resemblance to an ex-girlfriends baby, a man takes a paternity test, and the mother of his newfound child sues him for vandalism. A teenager fights to regain possession of her dog after temporarily giving it to a friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Lying Teens False Imprisonment?!; Dont Be Late for Court!
programme.desc: A 19-year-old sues her ex-boyfriend for holding her against her will and destroying her new phone. A woman admits that she lost her license due to a DUI and a friend sues her for the time he spent driving her around.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.title: A Secret to Die For
programme.desc: Big business and high rolling lifestyles turn deadly in a twisted, globe-trotting tale of deception, lies and murder.

programme.title: The Cleaner
programme.desc: Wicky is called to a shooting in a technology shop, where he finds himself sharing the night shift with Kai, a shelf-stacking conspiracy theorist who is preparing for the end of the world - which he insists is just around the corner. Is he paranoid or just being sensible? Wicky isnt sure, but either way, he has to decide where his own priorities lie.

programme.title: The Cleaner
programme.desc: There has been a tragic death in a stately home, and Wicky is on his way to clean up. But hes not the only person at the mansion with a job to do: theres a shaman on the scene as well, and he has his own mystical agenda. Wickys not sure that theres room enough for both of them, and when you factor in an owl and possibly a ghost, things are looking positively crowded.

programme.desc: When the evil Prince Ludwig kidnaps both Blackadder and Lord Melchett, the Queen remembers Blackadders earlier advice to have nothing to do with any ransom notes. Is our hero doomed, or does Baldrick have a cunning plan?

programme.title: Dinnerladies
programme.desc: The staff are catering for the firms millennium dinner at a venue across town. However, when Tony finds something on the fire escape, all thoughts of food are put right out of their minds.

programme.title: Dinnerladies
programme.desc: Anitas replacement is championed by Dolly but loathed by everyone else, while the bonkers Petulas bizarre lifestyle finally catches up with her. Meanwhile, a social worker suggests that Bren should ask her mother to live with her.

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Surbitons nets are twitching as war breaks out between the Goods and the Leadbetters over Margos new windbreak.

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom and Barbara catch fleas. The problem is how to keep the fleas from catching Margo and Jerry.

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee finally manages to get a job as a caretaker, but taking up the new post involves moving out of the flat. Elsewhere, Kate interviews potential new flatmates including Pete, and Tim sees an opportunity to get back together with Kate. Plus, Lees new boss proves to be a hard taskmaster. So, will Lee stick at the job or throw in the towel and move back in with Kate?

programme.title: Toast of London
programme.desc: Toast is intrigued to find that Ed is entering a Celebrities and Prostitutes Blow Football Tournament. Its an annual event organised by Eds showbiz charity, the River Rats.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his 1899 Appletons guide, Michael Portillos rail journey through eastern Canada continues along the Grand Trunk railway, following the route of the St Lawrence River. At Brockville, he leaves the tracks for a nautical pilgrimage through the beautiful Thousand Islands. In the port city of Kingston, Ontario, Michael visits Fort Henry and, dressed for the occasion, is entrusted to fire the naval guns that protected the nations southern border during the 19th century.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads for the Last Frontier of the United States armed with his 1899 Appletons Guide-Book to Alaska. Beginning his journey amid the snow-capped mountains and ice-cold inlets of the Kenai Peninsula, Michael finds the golden onion domes of a Russian Orthodox church along with traditional Russian food and costume and discovers that, 150 years ago, Alaska was a Russian colony.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of a North Yorkshire-based, family-run historic car auction business, which uncovers some remarkably rare vehicles in Thornton-le-Dale.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare 1980s Sierra Cosworth draws in a crowd of Ford fans, while a restorer delights buyers with his 1966 Sunbeam Rapier and Sarah takes a shine to a caravan.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: Uncovering and examining hidden structures built by the Nazis, from tunnels to towers, artillery sites, resistance nests and communication centres.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Hear how an assassination brought conflict to Europe in 1914.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Objects brought in by visitors include a ships anchor found in a garden pond, a medal given for heroism to a local sailor who helped break Captain Scotts ship out of Antarctic ice in 1901 plus theres even a rare example of early flat pack furniture dating back to the 17th-century.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head to Caversham Park near Reading. Its a busy day for the experts who specialise in written documents including a stunned appraisal of a very rare booklet containing notes made in the 17th-century by one of Shakespeares earliest readers.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek rubs shoulders with pop music royalty when he picks up a classic Morgan sports car. A World War Two ambulance arrives at Thornton le Dale and a Ford Model T needs a new home.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: This week at the Mathewsons, there is a 1982 Audi Quattro and a Sunbeam Alpine. Plus, Derek takes delivery of a beautiful green Renault van, previously used as a bread van in Paris.

programme.desc: Uncovering and examining hidden structures built by the Nazis, from tunnels to towers, artillery sites, resistance nests and communication centres.

programme.title: Burma with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon begins his journey in the biggest city in the country, Yangon, and drives north into Burmas Buddhist heartlands and the stunning ancient capital of Bagan, a sight that rivals the great wonders of the world.

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The last leg of Simon Reeves journey begins on the northern tip of Sumatra, near the epicentre of the 2004 tsunami, and takes him to the south western corner of Australia. In Banda Aceh, Sharia law is in force and Simon joins the local vice and virtue squad who patrol the streets and beaches. In the Indonesian capital of Jakarta, Simon investigates the shocking trade in exotic pets.

programme.title: The Lakes with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon explores the wild and rugged coast of Cumbria and learns how central the county is to many of the challenges facing Britain. The Lake District National Park includes a beautiful stretch of Cumbrias coast, where rare Natterjack Toads inhabit a spectacular sand dune landscape.
